testsuite.name: CPTask5Tests

testcase.name: ensureItRollbacksEverythingInCaseOfErrorInOne()
testcase.failure:
Wanted but not invoked: databaseApi.rollbackTransaction(1L); -> at CPTask5Tests.ensureItRollbacksEverythingInCaseOfErrorInOne(CPTask5Tests.java:123)

testcase.name: ensureItWorksInCaseOfConnectionOpenIssue()

failure.message: java.lang.AssertionError: expectation "expectComplete" failed (expected: onComplete(); actual: onError(java.util.concurrent.TimeoutException: Did not observe any item or terminal signal within 1000ms in 'map' (and no fallback has been configured)))
